Local Tips & Insider Advice: This beach is part of others along this stretch.
More peaceful beaches like Betelbatim, Benaulim and Varca are pretty close to Colva.

Nearby Colva Village offers a glimpse into traditional Goan life, with its colorful houses, quaint shops, and lively markets.
Walking towards Benaulim Beach from Colva Beach is recommended for a peaceful experience.
